title: About Me
name: Konstantin Shenderov
positionName: Test Automation Engineer and Full Stack Developer
description: Hello, I’m Konstantin Shenderov, a Senior Test Automation Engineer and Full Stack Developer based in Winnipeg, Canada. With over twelve years of experience in software, hardware, and firmware testing, paired with a strong foundation in full stack web development, I specialize in creating robust and innovative test automation solutions. My expertise spans across software testing, QA automation, and development, covering both front-end and back-end technologies. Whether it’s designing seamless web applications or implementing efficient test frameworks, I bring a comprehensive, results-driven approach to every project.
